review: Terrible. Wouldn't connect or stay connected to wifi. Apple TV and Roku work great in the room, but this was terrible. Shipped it back-- not even worth the $24 I paid for it on Prime Day.
author: Ewilli926

review: Excellent! Easy to hook up & use!
author: Becky B. Anderson

review: just love how easy it was to attach to my tv
author: purpnook

review: If we can install this and use it ANYONE can.........love it!!!!
author: GLORIA  EMORY

review: Works as good as my Amazon Fire TV one.
author: Larry Melamed

review: We are very pleased with the Fire Stick since we had been unable to access Amazon Prime heretofore (I cannot explain why, but the experts say it is so).  Also, now able to access Netflix from a TV that wasn't as smart as our main television.  Wish we had gotten in at the Prime Day pricing!
author: DA "Donna A"
